colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B ('DI LTA BU RNAM RTOG GIS BTABS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO RGYAL SRID KYI SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE, TSE RIGS NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LO BSGYUR BA MCHING GIS RIGS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO WANG GI'I SRAS LNGA PA BSTAN SRID KYI RIGS DANG LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA KHAS DANG, GSO RTZIS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHI THU DAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO PHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, ,SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN @013A *, ,NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES BU SKU TSE RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG BGEGS 'BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG, BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,
